panels.description:
- Сортировка по колонкам

- hdd_exception - список исключений для Disk stat - принудительный good

- hdd_exception (All) = no exception

targets.expr: (node_boot_time_seconds{job="$node_exporter", instance=~"^($linux_hdd_exception)$"} * 0 + 50) or max by (instance) (round(100 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$node_exporter", fstype!~"tmpfs|fuse.*|squashfs|iso9660", mountpoint!~"/boot.*|/snap.*", instance!~"^($linux_hdd_exception)$"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$node_exporter", fstype!~"tmpfs|fuse.*|squashfs|iso9660", mountpoint!~"/boot.*|/snap.*", instance!~"^(linux_$hdd_exception)$"} * 100)))

panels.title: Linux

panels.description:
Blackbox Exporter monitoring overview

Shows:
- URL being monitored
- Probe status (UP/DOWN)
- SSL certificate expiry (days remaining)

Color coding:
- Green: SSL expires in >1 day
- Yellow: SSL expires in <1 day
- Red: SSL expired or no SSL
panels.title: Blackbox

panels.description:
- Сортировка по колонкам

- disk_exception - list of instances to force Disk stat to 'good'

- disk_exception (All) = no exception

- Compatible with Windows Exporter 0.29.2 and 0.31.3
panels.title: Windows

list.description: Select instances to force Disk stat to 'good' regardless of actual disk usage. Leave empty to use normal thresholds.
list.label: linux_hdd_exception
list.name: linux_hdd_exception

list.description: UID дашборда на который можно будет вернуться (для кнопки Back)
list.label: back_uid
list.name: back_uid

list.description: Select instances to force Disk stat to 'good' regardless of actual disk usage. Leave empty to use normal thresholds.
list.label: windows_hdd_exception
list.name: windows_hdd_exception
